utils module¶

utils.getFileNames(folder)¶

Returns a list of every file name in a given folder

Parameters

folder (str) – Relative path of folder to search

Returns

List of file names

Return type

list

utils.parsePrice(symbol, date)¶

Reads stock price data from a fetched file

Parameters

  • symbol (str) – Stock symbol to find price for

  • date (str, "yyyy-mm-dd") – Date to find stock price on

Returns

Stock price of symbol on date, -1 if unavailable

Return type

int

utils.readSymbols(filename)¶

Parses a text file of line-separated stock symbols into a list

Parameters

filename (str) – Relative path of file

Returns

List of stock symbols

Return type

list

utils.writeSymbols(symbols, target)¶

Writes a list of stock symbols to a line-separated text file

Parameters

  • symbols (list) – List of stock symbols

  • target (str) – Relative path of file to write to

Stock-Evaluator
